verbs.description: [V: Disgraced] [ARG1: sheriff] Joe Arpaio is running for Senate in Arizona . He ’s a criminal . He ’s only able to run right now because instead of serving some form of prison time , he was pardoned by fellow criminal and white supremacist in chief Donald Trump . After ...
